com.yahoo.labs.samoa.moa.classifiers.core.splitcriteria

Interface SplitCriterion

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.github.javacliparser.Configurable, MOAObject, OptionHandler, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GiniSplitCriterion, InfoGainSplitCriterion, InfoGainSplitCriterionMultilabel, SDRSplitCriterion, SDRSplitCriterionAMRules, VarianceReductionSplitCriterion

    public interface SplitCriterion
extends OptionHandler
    Interface for computing splitting criteria. with respect to distributions of class values. The split criterion is used as a parameter on decision trees and decision stumps. The two split criteria most used are Information Gain and Gini.
    Version:
    $Revision: 7 $
    Author:
    Richard Kirkby (rkirkby@cs.waikato.ac.nz)
